item.title: GSBR #2: Components and Splitting Tasks
item.description: Last Friday the team met in the project lab to talk about next steps and move forward. The Github page wasn’t set up when I wrote the first post, but it can be found here. Theo and Emmanuel started work on the platform we need to build. The platform/base given to us works fine for a rover style robot, but is not very suited for a self-balancing robot. We decided on a two or three platform base, keeping the battery pack on the highest level since it is the heaviest.
